en-US.summary: In this interactive adventure game, you take on the role of a deity who must answer the questions of your followers. Your answers will shape civilization...
examplePhrases: Alexa open the hands of an angry god
Alexa, start the hands of an angry god
Alexa, launch the hands of an angry god
en-US.name: The Hands of an Angry God
en-US.description: You are an ancient deity who sleeps in a holy temple. You awaken once every one thousand years. A single worshiper earns the right to ask you an important question. Make sure your answer is a good one!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
Open the game by saying "Alexa, Open The Hands of an Angry God"

In every age, a follower will ask you a question like "Is it GOOD for me to have a gerbil as a pet, or is it BAD?" You can answer in any way that contains the key phrase such as "Gerbils are GOOD", "GOOD", or "I think gerbils are BAD", for example. The effects of your pronouncements will affect civilization in the coming millennia. Use your wise decisions to guide your civilization to success, or, more likely, chaos.
